description: The coolest Linux game I've ever played.

hex-a-hop may be the greatest puzzle game ever! it's basically mazes with unspecified endings and multiple possible solutions. i got so obsessed with the increasing challenges, i basically become addicted. seemingly impossible obstacles preoccupied me so much, i couldn't stop thinking about them and looking back at them every free second of every day. then oh! the endorphin rush when i finally resolved them! much thanks and praise to Tom Beaumont! you not only made so many cute fun interesting intellectual exercises, you also devised so many deviously intense frustrating and ultimately satisfying dilemmas.
Great Game, but sadly not made for high resolution screens.
